subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Scoring the game’s only touchdown with 43 seconds remaining, the Steelers came from behind to beat the Ravens and win the A.F.C. North, grabbing a first-round bye in the playoffs.
snippet: Scoring the game’s only touchdown with 43 seconds remaining, the Steelers came from behind to beat the Ravens and win the A.F.C. North, grabbing a first-round bye in the playoffs.
